caption.p: Predicted structures of a differentially expressed nORF (MSTRG.2270.1) with 3′UTR (3′ end coloured in red) of PF3D7_1013400 using I-TASSER; b differentially expressed intergenic nORF (MSTRG.4174.1) using QUARK; and c two AltORFs that have protein expression that was anticorrelated with the associated reference genes using QUARK
